author: cmpilato
msg: Don't bailout of activity deletion just because the associated txn is gone.
(dav_svn_delete_activity): Stop writing errors to the log for a
largely ignorable condition -- that the transaction associated with
an activity has gone missing.  Cleaning up after itself is a
feature of the filesystem.  This early bailout was also causing
dangling activities to be left forever in the activities database.

msg: Book: improve the descriptions of ignoring files.

author: julianfoad
msg: Improve help for '-x': don't say it is for GNU diff, as it is for any diff;
also state the default value, as it is not obvious.
